content: a top-down sock featuring a traditional gansey motif on the upper leg with ribbing to the toe so that the total effect is of a stately lighthouse worked in a heavier sock or sport yarn as shown it will be sized to fit a man s foot in lighter-weight yarns on smaller needles it will be slimmer to fit a female foot > join the knitspot vip email list at www barenakedwools com for weekly knit inspo new releases and exclusive design discounts
